code: import React from"react";import"./style.css";import{jsx as _jsx}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{jsxs as _jsxs}from"react/jsx-runtime";import{Fragment as _Fragment}from"react/jsx-runtime";var Wrapper=function Wrapper(){var data=[{cover:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-truck-fast"}),title:"Worldwide Delivery",decs:"We offer competitive prices on our 100 million plus product any range."},{cover:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-id-card"}),title:"Safe Payment",decs:"We offer competitive prices on our 100 million plus product any range."},{cover:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-shield"}),title:"Shop With Confidence ",decs:"We offer competitive prices on our 100 million plus product any range."},{cover:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{class:"fa-solid fa-headset"}),title:"24/7 Support ",decs:"We offer competitive prices on our 100 million plus product any range."}];return/*#__PURE__*/_jsx(_Fragment,{children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("section",{className:"wrapper background",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"container grid2",children:data.map(function(val,index){return/*#__PURE__*/_jsxs("div",{className:"product",children:[/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("div",{className:"img icon-circle",children:/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("i",{children:val.cover})}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("h3",{children:val.title}),/*#__PURE__*/_jsx("p",{children:val.decs})]},index);})})})});};export default Wrapper;
